attributes.action: max davis Term-time holidays: Parents of boy fighting cancer threatened with fine over charity trip
attributes.additional_details: i would like to petition the fact this little boy and his family wish to go on a charity holiday as he is in remission from his cancer but the schools are not allowing him or his sister to do so............schools can do what they want they have many inset teacher training days surely the education board have a heart somewhere please look at their case and the case of many many other children that are of poor health and bring some happiness to them thank you
